question:
You are being sent on a one month work assignment in San Francisco, California. You need a place to stay while
you are there. Write a letter to the Maury Samson Real Estate Agency. In your letter:
 explain the situation
 describe the kind of accommodation you would like
 provide the dates you will need it
text: I am writing to enquire about accommodations for a short-term, work-related stay for myself.

Let me explain my situation in detail. I am working with TCS and will be travelling to San Francisco in the month of December for project deployment. Due to the hectic work schedule, I am looking for a place within walking distance of HCP, my work location in the city.

Although a luxurious service apartment with in-house laundry, microwave, and dishwasher would suffice, I would prefer a full-time helper. Due to the fact that I will be travelling during peak winter, it becomes imperative for the heating unit to be fully functional. Additionally,I would need a parking slot in the residential building as I will be self-driving to the office daily.
Could you provide me with appropriate options for December 1st to December 31st , the period of my stay? Kindly include the cancellation policy as well.
